```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# RESULTS

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)
library(gt)

#hast  <- read.csv("V4.csv")
hast  <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/umontano/kar/master/hasta_nada_mas.csv")

#hast$Tiempo <- scale(hast$Tiempo, center=TRUE, scale=TRUE)

results_anova <- aov(Tiempo ~ Imagen + MD + Imagen:MD, data=hast)
```

## Two-Way Boxplot

```{r boxplot, include=TRUE}

boxplot(Tiempo ~ Imagen + MD + Imagen:MD, data=hast)

```


```{r regression1, include=FALSE}

m1 <- lm(Tiempo ~ Imagen + MD + Imagen:MD, data=hast)

```

## Results of Multivariate Regression with Interaction

```{r table1, echo=FALSE}
m1  %>%
        tbl_regression(exponentiate = FALSE, intercept=FALSE)  %>%
        as_gt()  %>%
        tab_header("Coeffiecients for the Model Image and MD as predictors of RTs, with Interaction", subtitle = NULL)


```




## Regression Without Interaction

```{r regression2, include=FALSE}

m2 <- lm(Tiempo ~ Imagen + MD , data=hast)
#summary(lm(Tiempo ~ Imagen , data=hast))
#summary(lm(Tiempo ~ MD , data=hast))


```
```{r table2, echo=FALSE}
m2  %>%
        tbl_regression(exponentiate = FALSE, intercept=FALSE)  %>%
        as_gt()  %>%
        tab_header("Coeffiecients for the Model, without Interaction", subtitle = NULL)


```




## Results Of Two-Way ANOVA 

```{r anova, include=TRUE}
summary(results_anova)


```

## Tukey Post-Hoc Analysis

```{r}
TukeyHSD(results_anova)
```
